content: through the bottom centre pull yarn to tighten you can watch a video totorial on how to make ribbing here click on the link or scan qr code https //youtu be/wrn4xldvkoy stem with a tendril use green color yarn row 1 chain 7 turn back with single_crochet 6 starting from the second chain from the hook chain 12 turn back with slip_stitch 11 starting from the second chain from the hook twist the tendril slightly cut off the yarn leaving a long yarn tail for sewing and fasten_off a video on how to make the stem with the tendril you can watch here click on the link or scan qr code https //youtu be/yah32aztbwm leafuse green color yarn chain 5 start crocheting from the 3rd chain from the hook single_crochet 2 slip_stitch chain 1 slip_stitch in the previous chain continue crochet on the other side of the beginning of the chain single_crochet 2 cs 2 slip_stitch cut the yarn leaving a long yarn tail for sewing and fasten_off watch a video on how to make the leaf click on the link or scan qr code https //youtu be/ef_065xd_l4 sew the stem with the tendril to the pumpkin you can watch an assembling video here click on the link or sсan qr code https //youtu be/lsyzcgeq-h4 3 a step by step video tutorial on how to crochet this pumpkin can be watched here click on the link or scan qr code https //youtu be/lrc1n3w20hc thank you for choosing my pattern i would love to see your creation - so make sure to link me in your photo on instagram or facebook https //www facebook com/amigurumijoys https //www instagram com/amigurumi_joys http //amigurumijoys tilda ws/ get updates news promo codes and much more join my newsletter to receive regular updates https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/u6j1v6
